channel.title: Xanor
channel.description:
[center][img]http://xanor.bugs3.com/forums/upload/public/style_images/7_logo123.png[/img]
[size=20pt]|[/size] [URL=http://xanor.bugs3.com/]HomePage[/URL] [size=20pt]|[/size] [URL=http://xanor.bugs3.com/forums/upload/]Forums[/URL] [size=20pt]|[/size] [URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/vofmduixzc91xw6/Xanor.jar]Downloadable Client[/URL] [size=20pt]|[/size] [URL=http://xanor.bugs3.com/webclient/webclient.html]Webclient[/URL] [size=20pt]|[/size]
[b]Me (WhiteKoala), and my friend (Robin), thought about starting a fun new server. It is based on more of economy than PKing. All 24 skills working, and having own destinations to train them. I'm not going to bore your mind here by telling you that this server has perfect timers, perfect skilling, perfect this, peftect that. You've seen all that stuff before, but I will ask you to take a small 2 minutes of your day so I can have the opportunity to present you my efforts that I put into this server. [font=Verdana]Donation system, Vote system and highscores are coming very soon![/font][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5H8KJs2.png[/img]
[img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/7324/77h.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/POTc8WP.png[/img]
[/center]

Me (WhiteKoala), and my friend (Robin), thought about starting a fun new server. It is based on more of economy than PKing. All 24 skills working, and having own destinations to train them. I’m not going to bore your mind here by telling you that this server has perfect timers, perfect skilling, perfect this, peftect that.
